name: 5 Nights in Scary School Basic (Baldina FNAF)
name_original: 5 Nights in Scary School Basic (Baldina FNAF)
description:
Do you like scary or horror? Remember the famous teacher? She's back!

Your task is to be careful for 5 nights at scary school. The characters are very scary. They will look for you and try to leave you forever at school. Once you can survive 5 nights, then you will become free.


Have time to escape before you are caught!

IOS RELEASE!
